name: The Missing Student
description:
Click/Tap on the game display before playing, and make sure you're using English language for the input.

Control 

  • WASD - D-Pad (Move)
  • J/Z  - A (Interact)
  • K/X - B 
  • Enter - Start

The story of a boy who got up in an empty classroom, realizing it's 2057, and he needed to leave this place.

This project is a school project for Chonradsadornumrung School, Mathayom 3 (Grade 9) Room 5

Game by Hannor Smith, published as Supakorn Huemwang, with Supakorn Maharat, Sittha Janthawong, Kritsanat Dechwongsomchit, and Nutchanon Suksathid.
